Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks (20-15, sixth in the Western Conference) vs. Memphis Grizzlies (23-13, third in the Western Conference)
The Grizzlies are 2-2 against Southwest Division teams.
Memphis ranks second in the NBA with 30.5 assists per game led by Desmond Bane averaging 5.2.
Dallas is 4-2 against the rest of the division.
The Grizzlies average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game, while the Mavericks allow 12.9 per game.
The Mavericks average 13.3 made 3-pointers per game, allowing 14.1 made 3-pointers per game to the Grizzlies.
